Song.title: Your Name Is Matchless
Song.copyright: © 2015 Sovereign Grace Praise/Sovereign Grace Worship Music & words by Neil DeGraide & Colin Edge

Arrangement.text:
VERSE 1: [B]We were sinners, we were orphans,{,} [E] we were looking for a [B]hom[/A#]e [G#m] We were lost and [F#/A#]we were [B]broken,{,} wandering a[F#]lone [E] [B]Looking down at our condition[E],{,} You sent Your son to change ou[B /A#]r fate [G#m] Though we were hopeless[F#/A#]ly imp[B]risoned{,} He came to take our p[F#]lac[E]e
CHORUS 1: [B]Glory to the name of Jesus,{,} G[G#m]lory to the only name that saves [F#] Ransomed the captives,[E] Your name is matchl[B]ess [| F# | B E/B | B E/B]
VERSE 2: [B] What a mystery to fathom{,} [E] that we’re Your children set a[B]par[/A#]t [G#m] For we were ene[F#/A#]mies, not [B]pilgrims,{,} prodigals at [F#]heart [E] [B] But Your Spirit now has caused us{,} [E] to no longer doubt Your [B /A#]love [G#m] Abba, Father, [F#/A#]You have [B]bought us,{,} adopted through Your [F#]Son [E]
CHORUS 2: [B]Glory to the name of Jesus,{,} [G#m]Glory to the only name that saves [F#] Ransomed the captives,{,} [E] Your name is matchl[B]ess [| F#] [B]Glory to the name that freed us,{,} [G#m]Glory to the love that made a way [F#] Beauty for ashes;[E] Your name is matchl[B]ess [| F#]
BRIDGE: [E] [|] [E] Glory to Your [F#]name, Glory to Your [G#m]name, Glory to Yo[2/4]ur n[F#]ame
VERSE 3: [B] Ponder all we have been given:{,}[E] heirs to God through Jesus’ [B /A#]name [G#m] A stingless death has [F#/A#]been made [B]certain And glory now a[F#]waits, Your [E]glory now awaits
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 we were sinners we were orphans we were looking for a home we were lost and we were broken wandering alone looking down at our condition you sent your son to change our fate though we were hopelessly imprisoned he came to take our place chorus 1 glory to the name of jesus glory to the only name that saves ransomed the captives your name is matchless verse 2 what a mystery to fathom that were your children set apart for we were enemies not pilgrims prodigals at heart but your spirit now has caused us to no longer doubt your love abba father you have bought us adopted through your son chorus 2 glory to the name of jesus glory to the only name that saves ransomed the captives your name is matchless glory to the name that freed us glory to the love that made a way beauty for ashes your name is matchless bridge glory to your name glory to your name glory to your name verse 3 ponder all we have been given heirs to god through jesus name a stingless death has been made certain and glory now awaits your glory now awaits
